articles.author: AFP
articles.title: American Norman wins world 400m gold, SA's Van Niekerk finishes 5th - News24
articles.description: American Michael Norman made up for a disappointing fifth-placed finish at the Tokyo Olympics by winning the world 400m gold in Eugene on Friday.
articles.content:
American Michael Norman made up for a disappointing fifth-placed finish at the Tokyo Olympics by winning the world 400m gold in Eugene on Friday.

articles.title: Flex Automotive make the ultimate retro-inspired Toyota Land Cruisers - Carmag South Africa
articles.description: Japanese SUV retrofitter Flex Automotive, who offers conversions of Toyota Land Cruisers with a nostalgic twist have now branched out into America and intend on promoting a novel culture for enthusiasts on the new continent.
